name: Douglas Mcpherson
text:
Just what you expect not fast food that is great, love take our granddaughter her.
The ham and cheese hot sub is my favorite. Granddaughter loves the pastas.

name: Barry Poulson
text: A good Burger King. Had double whopper no cheese, spouse single whopper no cheese, and two plain whopper patties for the giant dog. Quite tasty!

name: John Deyoe
text: The wood around outside of table sticky also around salad bar,service slow. Restroom needed 2 B cleaned good . THIS  WAS IN MARSHALL !!!.  I can see Y some R closing

name: Cassandra Linklater
text: The buffet was very delicious. There was a lot of kinds of pizza and very nice choices on the salad bar. They brought Pizza out frequently. The buffet was well attended to. Staff was very friendly and courteous. We will definitely be back!

name: Toney Family
text: Very dated and filthy inside. Still like the hut look. Pizza Hut needs to bring back their "original" hand tossed traditional style pizza, not this new one that looks yellowish. Thin and crispy is still the best thing pizza around, for chain restaurants. Don't deliver far outside city limits, hungry Howie's goes all over.

name: Kerri suZie
text: We got the buffet today and there were only three choices of pizza.  I expected there to be a full variety but three?  And to top it off the breadsticks were cold.   I was not impressed and will NOT be back.  Very disappointed in this Pizza Hut.

text: Ran out of pizza... during lunch time.  Then when they finally did get pizza out, they rolled out about 3 of them... the place was packed.  Ran out of my drink and didn't get offered to refill until I was ready to leave.  Probably won't go back myself.  Not trying to be mean but not an enjoyable experience.

text: Much better overall. Salad bar was fresh and stocked. So much better now than previous staff in the past. Definite improvements....

text: The waitress was great. The food was basically oli with a side of pizza. The busser, kept staring at us, as if he's waiting for us to leave. The place was nasty. Dead flys everywhere. We have no intention of going back. Thought it was weird that the place wasn't busy...Now I know why.
